Receive the Charge.name: Receive the Charge
Receive the Charge.flavor: You ready yourself for an approaching enemy, deftly maneuvering to a better position and striking before your foe strikes you.
Receive the Charge.trigger: An enemy enters a square adjacent to you
Receive the Charge.effect: Before the attack, you shift 1 square.

Earthsense.name: Earthsense
Earthsense.flavor: Your connection with the earth allows you to sense even the faintest tremors in stone, letting you see what others cannot.
Earthsense.effect: Until the stance ends, you gain tremorsense 10.

Mountain Stance Strike.name: Mountain Stance Strike
Mountain Stance Strike.flavor: You call on the weight of the mountains to crash down on your foes and to ground yourself against your enemiesâ€™ attacks.
Mountain Stance Strike.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone. If the target stands up before the end of your next turn, you can make a melee basic attack against it as an immediate interrupt if you are adjacent to it.
Mountain Stance Strike.effect: You assume the mountain stance. Until the stance ends, you gain a +2 bonus to AC, and you can ignore being pulled, pushed, slid, or knocked prone.
